longInfo:
Passport required.
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  must be valid
  on arrival. 
- British passports endorsed  British Subject  containing a
  Certificate of Entitlement to the Right of Abode issued by
  the United Kingdom must be valid on arrival. 
- British passports endorsed  British Overseas Territories
  Citizen  issued by Gibraltar must be valid on arrival. 
- Identity Cards issued by Gibraltar must be valid on arrival.
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.
- Other British passports must be valid for at least 3 months
  beyond the period of intended stay.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card: 
 - issued by Gibraltar.

Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Citizen . 
Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Overseas Territories Citizen , issued by
Gibraltar.
Visa required, except for Holders of Identity Cards issued by
Gibraltar. 
Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Subject , containing a Certificate of
Entitlement to the Right of Abode issued by the United
Kingdom. 
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for holders
of British passports endorsed  British Overseas Territories
Citizen , issued by  (SEE NOTE 56269)

    NOTE 56269: The max. stay is granted within 180 days.
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for holders
of endorsed  British Subject , not containing a Certificate of
Entitlement to the Right of Abode issued by the United
Kingdom. (SEE NOTE 56269) 
    NOTE 56269: The max. stay is granted within 180 days.
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for holders
of British passports endorsed  British National (Overseas) ,
 British Overseas Citizen  or  British Protected Person . (SEE
NOTE 56269) 
    NOTE 56269: The max. stay is granted within 180 days.
Additional Information:
- Valid visas in full, invalidated travel documents are
  accepted provided accompanied by a new travel document
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required. 

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis. malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  vivax, is very limited and may exist from May to October in
  villages of the Evrotas delta area in Lakonia district in
  agricultural areas with large migrant populations. There is
  no risk in tourist areas. Recommended prevention in risk
  area: A.
